attributes.action: Make ID Cards useful by including vital medical data which is accessible by emergency services quickly and to include other forms of ID on this one card.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
These cards could be a wonderful idea if only they were going to be useful. Not only could they include basic ID, they should include with biometric data peoples health conditions, allowing the emergency services to access these quickly e.g. asthma, allergic to penecillin. 
What we petetion is that these could have SUCH POTENTIAL, and should be explored as such.
